features: High-Quality Craftsmanship - Elevate your hygiene with the Vayzluiy Handheld Bidet Sprayer. Crafted with precision, featuring a solid brass valve body, a 304 stainless steel sprayer, and leak-proof stainless steel braided hose, this product ensures years of reliable use.

Cost-Effective - Reduce your reliance on toilet paper and wet wipes, minimizing the risk of clogging pipes while promoting a cleaner, more hygienic experience. The Vayzluiy handheld bidet sprayer offers an effective and refreshing cleansing experience.

Versatile Bidet Sprayer - This handheld spray hose is not only designed for personal cleansing but also provides gentle and thorough cleaning for women during pregnancy and menstrual cycles. Additionally, it serves as a diaper sprayer, toilet cleaner, bedpan washer, and even a convenient pet shower.

Adjustable Water Flow - The Vayzluiy handheld bidet sprayer features adjustable water flow, allowing you to customize water pressure for different scenarios. Enjoy a gentle spray for personal care or a powerful stream to tackle stubborn stains.

Easy Installation - Installing the Vayzluiy Handheld Bidet Sprayer is a breeze. No special tools or professional plumbing services are required. Before purchasing, ensure your toilet tank and water supply line have a 7/8-inch size. The kit includes all necessary components and clear installation instructions. For any questions, feel free to reach out to us through Amazon.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Turn Off Water This is typically done by turning a valve that's located on the wall near your toilet. Install T-Valve the t-valve under the toilet tank by turning it counterclockwise. Connect water supply Connect the water supply line back to the lower part of the t-valve Attach bidet hose Attach the hexagonal nut to the t-valve and the conical part of the hose to the sprayer head. Install Holder Install the bidet holder to either the wall using the anchors & screws or to the toilet tank. Next page HOW TO INSTALL YOUR TOILET BIDET SPRAYER 1 TURN OFF WATER 2 INSTALL T-VALVE 3 CONNECT WATER SUPPLY 4 ATTACH BIDET HOSE 5 INSTALL HOLDER

Can I install the bidet sprayer on my own? Yes, absolutely. We provide installation videos and our excellent customer support team will be ready to help you with any questions you may have. No need to spend more time and money on hiring a plumber. How's the water pressure of this bidet sprayer? The sprayer offers a range of pressure, from a gentle rinse to a strong spray, that can be adjusted for comfort How can I avoid leaks when using the handheld sprayer? To prevent leaks, always ensure that all connections are properly tightened and secured. It's recommended to switch off the water flow when the sprayer is not in use. Does the sprayer require any regular maintenance? The sprayer requires minimal maintenance. We recommend regularly checking the connections for tightness and cleaning the nozzle to prevent mineral buildup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, distance from handle to nozzle is a tad short
reviews.reviewText: So, we got this for using it in our camper. Reason (if you don't have a camper) is because there can sometimes be issues with toilet paper in the holding tank. Depending on other circumstances, excess toilet paper...and other stuff...can make it difficult to dump the tank. Especially if you do not have quite enough water mixed in with the other waste you are trying to dump.If you eliminate a good portion of the toilet paper, and replace that paper with water, you are doing yourself a great service when it is time to dump the tank.I do like that the volume of water can be adjusted at the connection. But also with the lever on the wand as you use it. I do wish there was more distance between the handle and the spray nozzle. This is the part we have some issue with. It is difficult to wash your bottom and not get your hand wet.The handle mount is nice in that it can be removed from the tank hanger, and mounted to the wall beside the toilet.Not difficult at all to install. If you can connect a water line to your sink or a toilet, you can install this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice metal construction for handheld bidet
reviews.reviewText: This all-metal (stainless steel) handheld bidet replaces the old plastic one I had; from the sprayer head to the hose, this seems more durable than what I had last. The main difference between this bidet and the last one is the diverter accessory (T-valve); it connects the cold water supply hose to the diverter that has a valve handle to the toilet tank.When installing, I temporarily misplaced the two washers (one for the sprayer head, the other for the T-valve), and that led to a leak! After finding the two washers in the box, I reattached the T-Valve, and boom, no more leaks. The kit also came with some Teflon tape but it felt more like a fabric, but I used some of it anyway-- especially on the threads that were metal on metal.The hose was long enough to be mounted on either side of the toilet tank. It wasn't "sticky" like my old handheld thanks to this one's braided hose. The sprayer head was easy to operate and you can control the strength of water by modulating the sprayer handle.Only time and regular usage will tell if this is truly stainless steel and doesn't rust. Still, it's already an upgrade for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Quality made, but terrible instructions and terrible plumbers tape
reviews.reviewText: The only reason I'm not giving this 1 star is because I also think my toilet contributed to the difficulty of getting this thing installed. The sprayer itself is really well made, like surprisingly so. You wouldn't think for $25 that you could get something so well crafted.However that's the only compliment I'll give. I don't understand why you would have such quality craftsmanship with such poor quality tape. The tape that's provided might as well be sheer. I ended up digging out my own tape since the tape that was included was proving to be useless.My biggest gripe is with the instructions, or lack thereof. I understand it's a pretty straight forward process, but it would be nice to have something to reference when something goes wrong during installation.It's almost as if they spent all of their effort into making a beautiful product, yet did the absolute bare minimum when adding the other components.Perhaps your experience will be better than mine.. 2/5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was super easy to install and the sprayer works really well. This works well as a bidet sprayer, but it also works great for cleaning the toilet too. I like how easy it is to control the water pressure with the trigger on the handle. It has a knob where it connects to the water source to turn off the water to keep it from being under constant pressure. It's also useful if you have young kids and you want to make sure they don't end up spraying the whole bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hand held unit
reviews.reviewText: This bidet is handheld which allows you the freedom to use this sprayer for other things as well. It is stainless steel and also has adjustable water pressure. there is a hook that hangs on your tank to put the bidet sprayer in when not in use. I assure you, that You will feel so much cleaner by using a bidet, and you will no longer have to buy all that toilet paper, which will save you a bundle. Actually , by what you save in toilet paper, you can pay for a bidet for every bathroom in your house and still have money left. I love my bidet and I know anyone who gets one of these will love it too. these things are great and you will not be disappointed . I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Installation was easy, comes with clear directions with pictures. Took 10 mins tops. I absolutely suggest this bidet for all life places, it is very usable and brings more hygiene for my family and guests. Materials are in good quality and easily installed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The bidet set came complete with everything you need to install. The sprayer and the valve are well made and very sturdy. The tube is made is metal and inside is also made with meshed metal which is better than plastic tubing that you may find in market. It came with hanger where you could put it on the wall (included is also two screws and wall anchors) or you could hang on the toiler itself. The water pressure is strong and the sprayer close shut when not pressed, and it is leak proof. Overall it is a complete bidet set and is made with high quality metal sprayer, valve, and water hose.
